metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25327 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The PAM module for fscrypt doesn't adequately validate fscrypt metadata files, allowing users to create malicious metadata files that prevent other users from logging in. A local user can cause a denial of service by creating a fscrypt metadata file that prevents other users from logging into the system. We recommend upgrading to version 0.3.3 or above

criterions.comment: fscrypt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
